name: py-continuum

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A clean and simple data loading library for Continual Learning

dependencies.name: pil
dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.

dependencies.name: py-datasets
dependencies.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: py-imagehash
dependencies.description: A Python Perceptual Image Hashing Module

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-mock
dependencies.description: Thin-wrapper around the mock package for easier use with py.test

dependencies.name: py-scikit-image
dependencies.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-torch
dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
